text:
Hi everyone,
I am a new here.

I have a question.
I am just created a landing page template.
Is there any way to create a global css setting for the landing page template?

For example,
I can change core colour of the template to red.
Then, all line, button background-color, header text will change its colour to red.

The problem is when a user uses my template, he has to change colour for those elements in section by section or module by module.

My current solution is creation a custom module which is global setting.
and place <style>css: hubl_value</style> at header of HUBL.
It’s work!. But I don’t sure it’s correct way or not.

Could you please suggest me?
Thank you

PS, Sorry to bother you all, if there was the same question like this.
